sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"调查，检查"之意。
means: examine ： 最普通用词，可指粗略地查看，也可指仔细观察或调查以确定事物的性质、功能、特点等。
inspect ： 侧重按一定质量标准检查某物，找出不足或不同之处。
investigate ： 指为发现事实真相或了解掌握情况而进行深入细致的现场考察。
scan ： 原义是仔细地检查分析，现用于指细看或浏览。

sentence.Network_en: They have the right to come in and inspect the meter.
Elaine went outside to inspect the playing field.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊莱恩走到外面查看操场。

sentence.Network_en: The captain wants to inspect your kit.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin inspect- 'looked into, examined', from the verb inspicere (from in- 'in' + specere 'look at'), or from its frequentative, inspectare

entry.def: If you inspect something, you look at every part of it carefully in order to find out about it or check that it is all right.

example.ex: Elaine went outside to inspect the playing field...
example.tran: 伊莱恩走到外面查看操场。

example.ex: Cut the fruit in half and inspect the pips: if they are turning slightly brown it is ready for harvesting.
example.tran: 把果实切成两半，检查一下其中的籽：如果有点成棕色，那就该收获了。

entry.def: When an official inspects a place or a group of people, they visit it and check it carefully, for example in order to find out whether regulations are being obeyed.

example.ex: The Public Utilities Commission inspects us once a year...
example.tran: 公共事业委员会每年到我们这里视察一次。

example.ex: Each hotel is inspected and, if it fulfils certain criteria, is recommended.
example.tran: 会对每家旅馆都进行检查,如果它达到了一定的标准,就获得推荐。

means.word_mean: 2. come to see in an official or professional capacity;
3. of accounts and tax returns; with the intent to verify

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

Sentence.sentence: She thinks that she may have to contact the Occupational Safety and Health Administration and asked that government agency to inspect the department.

sentences.en: The fire prevention branch inspects factories and all sorts of public buildings.
sentences.cn: 消防部门对工厂和各种公共建筑进行检查。

sentences.en: The mayor will inspect our school tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 市长明天要来视察我们学校。

jushi.english: The visiting president inspected the troops.
He inspected the new power station.
jushi.chinese: 他视察了那座新发电厂。

jushi.english: I inspected these photographs of the two murder weapons.
jushi.chinese: 我检查了两件凶器的照片。
